lu.softec.maven.mavenizer.mavenfile.internal
Class DefaultMavenFileParser

java.lang.Object
  lu.softec.maven.mavenizer.mavenfile.internal.DefaultMavenFileParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
MavenFileParser
public class DefaultMavenFileParser
extends java.lang.Object
implements MavenFileParser

Default implementation of the MavenFileParser interface. This implementation is instanciated per-lookup.

Constructor Summary

 java.io.File getBaseDir()
          Returns the base directory used while resolving relative library paths

getMavenFile

public MavenFile getMavenFile()
                       throws org.codehaus.plexus.util.xml.pull.XmlPullParserException,
                              java.io.IOException,
                              InvalidMavenCoordinatesException,
                              org.apache.maven.artifact.resolver.ArtifactResolutionException,
                              org.apache.maven.artifact.resolver.ArtifactNotFoundException
Description copied from interface: MavenFileParser
Read a MavenFile from the parser On success, the parser position is moved on the end tag of the artifact read On error, parser is stop where the error occurs.

Specified by:
getMavenFile in interface MavenFileParser
Returns:
the MavenFile instance
Throws:
org.codehaus.plexus.util.xml.pull.XmlPullParserException - when a parsing error occurs or a previously existing MavenFile exists and is inconsistant with the one read during parsing
java.io.IOException - when an I/O error occurs during parsing
InvalidMavenCoordinatesException - when a MavenFile with an invalid set of coordinate would have been created
org.apache.maven.artifact.resolver.ArtifactResolutionException
org.apache.maven.artifact.resolver.ArtifactNotFoundException
